job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: pstrongMust Havesstrongpulli6 years of experience designing building deploying testing maintaining monitoring and owning scalable resilient and distributed machine learning algorithms and systemsliliExpertise with Machine Learning algorithms applied to Recommender Systems and SearchliliProficiency in operating machine learning solutions at scale covering the endtoend ML workflowliliExperience with offline experimentation and AB testingliliDeep knowledge of ML tools and frameworks TensorFlow Keras pyTorch scikitlearn Spark liliProficiency in programming languages such as Python or ScalaliliStrong understanding of modern approaches to Recommendation or Search GBDT CNN LSTM GRU HRNN transformers siamese neural networks variational autoencoders liliExperience with at least one of Deep Learning Contextual MultiArmed Bandits Reinforcement Learning Causal InferenceliliFamiliarity with realworld ML systems configuration data collection data verification feature extraction resource and process management analytics training serving validation experimentation monitoringliulpbrppstrongNice to HavesstrongpulliUnderstanding of batch and streaming data processing techniquesliliObsession for service observability instrumentation monitoring and alertingliliKnowledge of AWS or similar cloud platformsliliFamiliarity with CICD tools CircleCI Jenkins or similar to automate building testing and deployment of the ML algorithms and to manage the infrastructure Pulumi Terraform or CloudFormationliul
